msg: Use this channel for posting Hyperledger-specific job openings. Any jobs that are not Hyperledger specific will be removed by the moderator.

I don't have a job description written yet, but will soon and will post.   In the meantime: we are looking to engage with and engineer that has experience owning Hyperledger fabric in production. This will be a low-volume network.  We write chaincode in JS/TS.  Currently one chain with peers, but expect to operate multiple chains.  We may use channels as an alternative, if we feel confident in the design.   Immediate work is part time.  In 6-12 months we expect to need a full time role, which may be a remote-available position. Offices in NYC.

Hey guys, i know this is the wrongest place to ask but i'm new here and really confused. Where can i go to for contribution to docs please? Thank you for helping a n00b.
It depends on which hyperledger project that you are wanting to contribute docs to.  For example, hyperledger/indy-sdk/docs is a directory containing the docs for indy-sdk.
